about_the_game:
Street Basket Challenge it's an original 2-on-2 basketball game in SD style, with charismatic characters, and a game system based on the classic arcade beat 'em up.
As usual in the series, the rules of regular sports are not followed. Therefore, it is allowed to take the ball away from the opponent in any way.
Each team has a basket on each of the three backboards, high, medium and low. When a certain number of points are scored, the basket falls off the backboard. You can pick it up and fix it, but you can also take it and attach it to your opponent's board.
Each stage has different features such as traps and boost zones.
Characters have unique skills, special moves, and super shots.

The content of this playable preview demo is subject to change and may not represent the final product.

The full game will feature a tournament mode where it is possible to level up and improve the player's skills, plus more than 15 stages, 15 items, 46 special shots, 27 upgrades, and 20 teams for a total of 60 characters.
